key.name: last-update-timestamp
key.description: ISO timestamp of the last automatic wallpaper check.

key.name: last-wallpaper-copyright
key.description: The copyright notice of the last wallpaper downloaded.

key.name: last-wallpaper-url
key.description: The URL of the last wallpaper downloaded.

key.name: region
key.description: The region to use when downloading the wallpaper.
